Kobe Bryant managed just 18 points while committing six turnovers in 41 minutes.`` I don't approach the game like it's Kobe Bryant , and I want to have a Robert Horry game against him,'' Allen Iverson said. I want to play a good game against everybody. When you play well against another great player, it's only natural for you to feel good about the win. But that's not the most important thing for me.
